attributes.action: Nationalise all beaches in the UK , remove them from private ownership, and allow full and free access to everyone
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As an island nation, we should all have free and unhindered access to all of our coastline. Too many beaches and parts of our coastline are unaccessible without paying inordinate car parking and/or access fees.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Nationalise all beaches in the UK , remove them from private ownership, and allow full and free access to everyone."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page13689.asp

Prime Minister's Office
